ai-ja171:1.1_0: “As a good thing, when one’s things have arisen,
ai-ja171:1.3_0: So a wise man should not hurt another,
ai-ja171:1.4_0: for the noble ones are satisfied, sweet, and delightful.
ai-ja171:2.1_0: Having attained this life, because of contempt,
ai-ja171:2.2_0: In the world who are bad character.
ai-ja171:2.3_0: I’ll go forth in this very life,
ai-ja171:2.4_0: For there is no desire for sensual pleasures in this life.”
